snippet: Stump Merrill, who attended his first Old-Timers’ Day, spent decades managing in the minor leagues and managed the Yankees for a season and a half in a forgettable era.
abstract: Stump Merrill, who spent his entire managerial career in the New York Yankees organization in the forgettable pre-dynasty era, attends his first Old-Timers' Day at Yankee Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Stump Merrill, who attended his first Old-Timers’ Day, spent decades managing in the minor leagues and managed the Yankees for a season and a half in a forgettable era.

headline.seo: At Yankees’ Old-Timers’ Day, Stump Merrill Gets Some Gratitude
headline.main: Longtime Yankee, and Occasional Stopgap, Gets Bit of Recognition
headline.print_headline: Longtime Yankee, and Occasional Stopgap, Gets Bit of Recognition
